subject: Regarding Web Application Development
msgSnippet: Hi all, If I was about to build a Web solution, is it easy to implement it using web unit testing framework? And, ...
messageBody:
Hi all,

If I was about to build a Web solution, is it easy to implement it using web
unit testing framework?
And, ... << regarding the use of Spring Framework >> is there anyone here
has the experience of doing it???

--
Tender love,
Eko S.W.
